titleStmt.title: Neutrality condemned, by declaring the reasons vvhy the deputy-lieutenants, intrusted by the Parliament for Cheshire, cannot agree to the treaty of pacification made by some of that county: at Bunbery, December, 23. 1642. And may serve to prevent the like in other counties.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-Head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
